about_the_game:
Coin Collecting Challenge is a level-breaking platforming game. Players need to make full use of their jumping ability in different levels, and open the gate to pass the level by collecting enough gold coins. Brave the platform-jumping levels, collect all the coins, and open all the gates.

  • This is a single-player adventure with no story for the time being, just platforming game mode experience

  • For platforming gameplay, there are now only two levels.

  • Collect all the gold coins in the map, you can open the gate and successfully clear the level

The controls are simple and easy to pick up, just move and jump. The coins that need to be collected are often near the road, and if you look closely, you will easily spot them.

I'm sure you'll be able to clear the game soon.

name: Coin collection challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 /11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 /11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Corei7-12700/AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX3060/AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY

short_description: Coin Collecting Challenge is a level-breaking platforming game. Players need to make full use of their jumping ability in different levels, and open the gate to pass the level by collecting enough gold coins. Brave the platform-jumping levels, collect all the coins, and open all the gates.
